summary: Lance Inu ($LINU) on ERC-20! - Lance Inu ($LINU) is a utility token, a meme inspired by the French Bulldog, that will be used as the currency on the Lance Inu crypto marketplace. The marketplace is designed to provide users with a secure and efficient platform to buy and sell freelance services. When users sign up to offer freelance services on the marketplace, they will be required to use LINU as the currency for all transactions.
